item.title: Coral India Finance & Housing Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Shares of Coral India Finance & Housing Ltd have declined to a fresh 52-week low, closing near Rs 33.91, marking a significant milestone in the stock’s ongoing downward trajectory. This new low reflects persistent pressures on the company’s financial performance and market valuation amid a challenging environment for the diversified commercial services sector. Time: 15 minutes ago

item.title: Tata Technologies Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bearish Price Action
item.description: Tata Technologies Ltd (TATATECH) has witnessed a notable 10.23% surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity despite the stock’s recent underperformance. This increase in open interest, coupled with falling prices and volume patterns, suggests a shift in market positioning and potential directional bets by traders. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Life Insurance Corporation of India Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bullish Momentum
item.description: Life Insurance Corporation of India (LICI) has witnessed a significant surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling a notable shift in market positioning. The stock outperformed its sector and broader indices, buoyed by increased volumes and a strong price rally, prompting a reassessment of its near-term outlook despite a recent downgrade in its Mojo Grade to Sell. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: FSN E-Commerce Ventures Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Strong Price Momentum
item.description: FSN E-Commerce Ventures Ltd, the parent company of NYKAA, has witnessed a significant surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. item.title: Tata Elxsi Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bearish Momentum
item.description: Tata Elxsi Ltd., a mid-cap player in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector, has witnessed a notable 14.8% surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, even as the stock underperformed its sector and broader indices. item.title: Panache Digilife Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of Panache Digilife Ltd, a micro-cap player in the IT - Hardware sector, plunged to their lower circuit limit on 6 February 2026, closing at ₹328.50, down 4.06% on the day. The stock underperformed its sector and the broader market, reflecting intense selling pressure and a sharp decline in investor participation. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Orchasp Ltd Shares Plunge to Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Orchasp Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector, witnessed a sharp decline on 6 Feb 2026, hitting its lower circuit limit amid intense selling pressure. The stock closed at a new 52-week and all-time low of ₹2.07, marking a maximum daily loss of 8.42%, as panic selling gripped investors and supply remained largely unfilled. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Uno Minda Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amidst Weak Price Action

This increase comes amid a broader market environment marked by volatility and sector underperformance, prompting investors to reassess directional bets on the mid-cap stock. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Arshiya Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Shares of Arshiya Ltd surged to their upper circuit limit on 6 February 2026, propelled by robust buying interest and a maximum daily gain of 3.2%. The stock closed at ₹1.29, marking a significant outperformance against its sector and the broader market, despite a backdrop of falling investor participation and regulatory trading restrictions. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: HDFC Bank Sees Heavy Put Option Activity Amid Bearish Sentiment
item.description: HDFC Bank Ltd., one of India’s leading private sector banks, has witnessed a notable increase in put option trading activity, signalling growing bearish sentiment among investors. The surge in put contracts, particularly at the ₹950 strike price expiring on 24 February 2026, reflects cautious positioning and potential hedging strategies amid recent price underperformance and sector headwinds. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Godfrey Phillips India Ltd. Sees Surge in Value Trading Amid Mixed Technical Signals
item.description: Godfrey Phillips India Ltd. (GODFRYPHLP) emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks by value on 6 February 2026, registering a remarkable 11.75% gain intraday. Despite a downgrade in its Mojo Grade from Hold to Sell at the end of December 2025, the stock demonstrated robust price action, outperforming its sector and broader market indices amid a volatile trading session. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Davangere Sugar Company Ltd Sees Exceptional Volume Surge Amid Mixed Technical Signals
item.description: Davangere Sugar Company Ltd (symbol: DAVANGERE) emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks on 6 February 2026, registering a remarkable volume surge with over 2.13 crore shares exchanging hands by mid-morning. Despite a modest price gain of 0.24%, the stock outperformed its sector and broader market indices, signalling renewed investor interest amid a complex technical backdrop and a recent upgrade in its Mojo Grade from Strong Sell to Sell. item.title: AXISCADES Technologies Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of AXISCADES Technologies Ltd plunged to their lower circuit limit on 6 Feb 2026, closing at ₹1,121.7, marking a maximum daily loss of 5.0%. The stock faced intense selling pressure, with volumes skewed towards the day’s low, signalling panic selling and unfilled supply in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Tijaria Polypipes Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Robust Buying Momentum
item.description: Tijaria Polypipes Ltd witnessed a robust surge in its share price on 6 Feb 2026, hitting the upper circuit limit of 8.37% to close at ₹6.73. This sharp rally was driven by intense buying interest, with the stock outperforming its sector and broader market indices despite its micro-cap status and a recent downgrade to a Strong Sell rating by MarketsMOJO. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarterly earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across market capitalisation segments, revealing a modest improvement in positive results and a notable surge in mid-cap profitability. With 1,471 companies reporting, the quarter saw 47.0% of results beating expectations, marking a steady rise from the 42.0% recorded in September 2025 and the 40.0% in June 2025, signalling cautious optimism among investors. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: ITC Ltd Sees Surge in Call Option Activity Ahead of February Expiry
item.description: ITC Ltd., a stalwart in the FMCG sector, has witnessed a notable spike in call option trading, signalling increased bullish positioning among investors ahead of the 24 February 2026 expiry. The surge in activity, particularly at strike prices near the current market value, reflects growing optimism despite the stock’s recent underperformance relative to its sector peers. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Tera Software Ltd Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Tera Software Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector, surged to hit its upper circuit limit on 6 February 2026, closing at ₹427.55 with a maximum daily gain of 5.0%. This sharp rally was driven by robust buying interest, resulting in a regulatory freeze on further trading and signalling strong investor confidence despite recent volatility. Time: 16 minutes ago
